security: Information concerning individuals is restricted. Releasing specific details about Ivan Marti and Manuel Marti could violate privacy.
summary: This document concerns Manuel Marti, and includes a local agency check and information from the FBI about his brother, Ivan Marti, who was a subscriber to New Horizons for Youth.
summary_one_paragraph: A document dated November 22, 1968, details a local agency check related to Manuel Marti, focusing on information obtained from the New York Office of the FBI. The FBI reported that Ivan Marti, Manuel Marti's brother, subscribed to New Horizons for Youth. The document notes that the address associated with Ivan Marti was previously Manuel Marti's address until September 1965, according to Manuel Marti's Personal History Statement (DD Form 398).
title: [RESTRICTED]
